parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Fractured brake rotors can cause pieces of steel to damage other brake components, leading to loss of braking ability and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: sending pieces of steel into other brake components
and causing difficulty stopping the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Worn-out brake pads can lead to reduced braking ability, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Rear brake pads wear out prematurely due to exposure to weather

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS brakes can cause the vehicle to be unable to stop, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: The ABS brakes fail to function
making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle pulling to one side or the steering wheel jerking when braking can cause loss of control, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side when braking
or the steering wheel jerks when braking
making it difficult to control the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure and Air Pressure Loss
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure and air pressure loss can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: vehicle pulls to one side while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defect in the aluminum wheel rim can cause air pressure loss, leading to tire failure and potential accidents.
symptoms: Vehicle loses air pressure while sitting
air pressure loss in cold weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Rim Seal and Potential Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty rim seal can cause tire blowouts, leading to loss of vehicle control and potential accidents.
The failure of the heater core can cause the heating system to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility due to fogged windows, and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: the heater core fails to produce hot air
the low coolant light comes on
the vehicle's heating system is inoperable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window regulator can cause the windows to malfunction, potentially trapping occupants or obstructing their view, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: the window falls or gets stuck
the power window switch is broken.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front lower ball joint can cause the tire to separate from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: the tire separates from the vehicle
a popping noise is heard when turning

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear lower control arm can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The rear stabilizer bar attachments fail

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Insufficient Space between Right Front Tire and Sway Bar
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The insufficient space between the right front tire and sway bar can cause the tire to rub against the sway bar, leading to uneven tire wear, loss of control, and potential accidents.
symptoms: The right front tire rubs against the sway bar.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's tendency to wander while driving can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
